clue.en: __eral
clue.zh: 自由派

clue.en: A wing or winglike structure.
clue.zh: 翼或翼状结构。

clue.en: An optical or other representation of a real object; a graphic; a picture.
clue.zh: 真实物体的光学或其他表示；图形；一张照片。

clue.en: A theatrical work, combining drama, music, song and sometimes dance.
clue.zh: 一种戏剧作品，结合了戏剧、音乐、歌曲，有时还有舞蹈。

clue.en: Advertisement.
clue.zh: 广告。

clue.en: An act of __ing or raising.
clue.zh: 举起或举起的动作。

clue.en: __nology
clue.zh: 技术

clue.en: A freshwater fish of the family Cyprinidae, found across northern Europe and Asia, especially Leuciscus idus.
clue.zh: 鲤科的一种淡水鱼，分布于北欧和亚洲，尤其是雅罗鱼。

clue.en: A bundle of neurons with their connective tissue sheaths, blood vessels and lymphatics.
clue.zh: 一束神经元及其结缔组织鞘、血管和淋巴管。

clue.en: To form a line; to fall into line.
clue.zh: 形成一条线；排队。

clue.en: The conscious production or arrangement of sounds, colours, forms, movements, or other elements in a manner that affects the senses and emotions, usually specifically the production of the beautiful in a graphic or plastic medium.
clue.zh: 以影响感官和情感的方式有意识地产生或安排声音、颜色、形式、运动或其他元素，通常特别是在图形或塑料介质中产生美感。

clue.en: The unit of Japanese currency (symbol: ¥) since 1871, divided into 100 sen.
clue.zh: 自 1871 年以来的日本货币单位（符号：日元），分为 100 仙。

clue.en: The loose part of a coat; the lower part of a garment that plays loosely; a skirt; an apron.
clue.zh: 外套的宽松部分；宽松的衣服下半部分；裙子；围裙。

clue.en: A member of the class of animals Aves in the phylum Chordata, characterized by being warm-blooded, having feathers and wings usually capable of flight, and laying eggs.
clue.zh: 脊索动物门鸟纲的成员，其特征是温血动物，具有通常能够飞行的羽毛和翅膀，并且产卵。

clue.en: The distance from the base of something to the top.
clue.zh: 从某物的底部到顶部的距离。

clue.en: In agreement with the principles of logic.
clue.zh: 符合逻辑原理。

clue.en: Someone who has control over something or someone.
clue.zh: 控制某事或某人的人。

clue.en: A large body of ice which flows under its own mass, usually downhill.
clue.zh: 在自身质量下流动的大冰体，通常是下坡的。

clue.en: To ingest; to be ingested.
clue.zh: 摄取；被摄入。

clue.en: A design involving flowers
clue.zh: 涉及花卉的设计

clue.en: To disallow or reject.
clue.zh: 表示不允许或拒绝。

clue.en: A covered vehicle used for carrying goods or people, usually roughly cuboid in shape, longer and higher than a car but smaller than a truck/lorry.
clue.zh: 用于运载货物或人员的有盖车辆，通常形状大致为长方体，比汽车更长、更高，但比卡车/卡车小。
